Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2013 02:08PM goldenbetty wrote: Hey, pstamant. I had my first chemo last Wednesday, TH. I feel tired and nauseous off and on. The Benadryl really knocked me for a loop. I plan on cutting my hair this Tuesday so it won't be such of a shock. I am noticing that my scalp is a bit tender already. We can walk this journey together. We are strong!
Posts.Title: Started TC 7.2.2013. Anyone starting now? pstamant pstamant
